articles.title: Andhra Pradesh portfolio allocation: From Pawan Kalyan to Nara Lokesh, here's who got what - Moneycontrol
articles.description: Besides his chief ministerial duties, Naidu will be in charge of law & order and public enterprises. Deputy CM Pawan Kalyan will also handle Panchayati Raj, rural development & rural water supply, environment, forest, science & technology
